Package trails

Class TrailStorageContainer

java.lang.Object
trails.TrailStorageContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TrailStorageContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class provides storage and organizational functionality for Trail objects.
Author:
Brenden Lynch
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • TrailStorageContainer

      public TrailStorageContainer()
      Creates a new TrailStorageContainer object.

  • Method Details

    • addTrail

      public boolean addTrail​(Trail inputTrail)
      Adds a new Trail to the container. Automatically sorts the container alphabetically if this is successful.
      Parameters:
      inputTrail - The Trail to add to the container.
      Returns:
      a Boolean value reflecting the success of the operation.

    • deleteTrail

      public boolean deleteTrail​(Trail inputTrail)
      Removes a specified Trail object from the container. If an element is successfully matched and removed, the container is sorted alphabetically.
      Parameters:
      inputTrail - The Trail to be removed from the container.
      Returns:
      a Boolean value reflecting the success of the operation.

    • getTrail

      public Trail getTrail​(int index)
      Gets the Trail object at the specified index within the container's internal data structure.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the Trail to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The trail object at the specified index value, if found.

    • sortTrailList

      public void sortTrailList()
      Automatically sorts the container by alphabetical order.

    • searchTrailList

      public java.util.LinkedList<Trail> searchTrailList​(java.lang.String searchTerms)
      Performs a search through the container and returns Trail objects matching specified input search criteria in the form of a LinkedList.
      Parameters:
      searchTerms - The input search criteria to compare Trail objects to.
      Returns:
      a LinkedList containing all Trail objects that match the search criteria. If none found, this list is returned empty.

    • size

      public int size()
      Gets the size of the internal data structure.
      Returns:
      an int value reflecting the size of the internal data structure.
